description: Look no further than the fireball cola slush if you're looking for a delicious and easy cocktail to make this summer. This revitalizing drink contains a blended mixture of coca-cola and fireball whiskey, making it perfect for sipping by the pool or enjoying a&nbsp;summer party.Plus, it's incredibly easy to makeâ€”simply combine the ingredients in a blender and&nbsp;freeze for a few hours. Simply garnish with a lemon slice when you're ready to serve and enjoy. Cheers!
name: Fireball Cola Slush

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the cola into an ice tray and freeze.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the cola into an ice tray and freeze.

recipeInstructions.name: Take out the frozen cola cubes and put them together with the Fireball in a blender.
recipeInstructions.text: Take out the frozen cola cubes and put them together with the Fireball in a blender.

recipeInstructions.name: Blend on high setting until you attain a slushie consistency.
recipeInstructions.text: Blend on high setting until you attain a slushie consistency.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into a glass and serve with a straw or mini spoon.
